site.title: ub-MOJI | AI Vision Lab
site.description: ub-MOJI is a Japanese fingerspelling video dataset designed to advance research in sign language recognition.

home.title: Home
home.description: ub-MOJI is a Japanese fingerspelling video dataset designed to advance research in sign language recognition

hero.title: ub-MOJI: A Japanese Fingerspelling Video Dataset
hero.description: ub-MOJI is a Japanese fingerspelling video dataset designed to advance research in sign language recognition

fingerspelling.title: Japanese Fingerspelling Coverage
fingerspelling.description: Supports syllables, 5-character sequences, and full words

temporal.title: Temporal Annotation
temporal.description: Precise start-end timing for every fingerspelled unit

metadata.title: Rich Participant Metadata
metadata.description: Includes detailed demographic and consent metadata for participant-aware modeling and analysis.

license.title: Academic-Only License
license.description: Available under terms restricting use to non-commercial academic research

news.title: News
news.empty: No news has been published yet.

metadata.title: Metadata Overview
metadata.caption: An overview of the basic information and participant information included in this dataset. Provided as CSV files.

datasetTable.caption: Basic information such as the video file path, category, and recording conditions.

descriptions.fileName: File path of the video sample
descriptions.participantAge: Age of the participant at time of recording: `18-23`, `24-29`, ..., `60+`, or `-1` (unknown)
descriptions.signLanguageExperience: Years of sign language experience: `1-3`, `4-6`, ..., `51+`, or `-1`
descriptions.hearingLevel: Self-reported hearing level: `0` (no issues) to `4` (severe), or `-1` (unknown)

participantsTable.caption: Demographic information and consent details for participants in the dataset.

descriptions.age: Age group of the participant at time of recording: `18-23`, `24-29`, ..., `60+`, or `-1` (unknown)
descriptions.signLanguageExperience: Years of sign language experience: `1-3`, `4-6`, ..., `51+`, or `-1`
descriptions.hearingLevel: Self-reported hearing level: `0` (no issues) to `4` (severe), or `-1` (unknown)

temporalAnnotation.title: Temporal Annotation
temporalAnnotation.caption: Example temporal annotation showing precise start and end timing for fingerspelling sequences. Each row represents a fingerspelling unit with frame-level accuracy.

demo.title: Sample Videos
demo.caption: Representative samples from the ub-MOJI dataset showing various fingerspelling patterns
